page.title: 20TRADE
page.content: THE SHOPPING PRECINCT IN STATION ROAD OPENED IN 1978.THERE IS A BANK,POST OFFICE & NEWSAGENTS,OFF LICENSE,DIY, SUPERMARKET,GREENGROCERS,HAIRDRESSER, FLOOR & WALL CRAFT,CHEMIST,CHINESE TAKE AWAY,SUSSEX ENBROIDERY & ESTATE AGENT WHICH OPENED IN 1982 DUE TO THE HOUSING DEVELOPMENT.BEFORE THE VILLAGE DEVELOPED THE SHOPS WERE ALONG THE WORTHING ROAD.TODAY THERE IS THE BAKERY,SPAR GROCERY,H.BAKER & SON BUILDERS,WILLIAM WAY BUILDER SUPPLIERS THERE IS A SOUTH FARM SHOP JUST NORTH OF THE OLD RAILWAY BRIDGE.WHEELWRIGHTS IS HERE TO WHICH WAS THE VILLAGE WHEEL WRIGHTS & FORGE.THE PIPER FAMILY HAVE BEEN HERE FOR 2-300 YEARS,AND AS THE FORGE WAS NO LONGER USED IT WENT TO SINGLETON MUSEUM,& SOME TOOLS TO HORSHAM MUSEUM.UPPER WORTHING RD.HAS AN ANTIQUE SHOP,CARAVAN PARK,GARAGE, NEWSAGENT & PUB.THERE ARE NO HOTELS.
